definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: Spring City in Kunming is very cool.
The cause cause chalkiness clothes are not cooler is these you reflect the heat.
sentences.chinese: 白色衣服穿上去較量涼快的理由是反射熱。

sentences.english: I'm going into the woods to cool off.
sentences.chinese: 我想進樹林子裏去涼快一下。

sentences.english: A lot of cottons and silks are cool but they wrinkle easily.
sentences.chinese: 很多純棉和絲綢都很涼快，就是很容易起皺。

sentences.english: There was cool, dappled sunlight under the trees.
sentences.chinese: 樹叢下很涼快，陽光只剩下斑斑點點。

sentences.english: Simply having the cooling shirt might not be sufficient to cool you down.
sentences.chinese: 僅穿着“涼衫”還不足以使您涼快下來。

sentences.english: It’s hot enough to melt hell. I hope it will be cooler soon.
sentences.chinese: 現在熱得足以把地獄熔化了，希望很快能夠涼快一點。

sentences.english: A lot of cottons and silks are cool but they  wrinkle easily.
sentences.chinese: 很多純棉和絲綢都很涼快，就是很容易起皺。
這個竹椅摸起來很涼快。

sentences.english: The room was cool after the sun had gone down.
sentences.chinese: 太陽下山後，這房間就涼快了。

sentences.english: And water vapor pressure is lower when the air is cooler, meaning sweat evaporates faster.
sentences.chinese: 涼快時水蒸發壓低，這意味着汗水能很快蒸發。

sentences.english: So why not cool down with a gelato?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不來一份冰淇淋涼快一下呢？

sentences.english: I prefer this to a hot room.
sentences.chinese: 在熱熱的房間裏，我喜歡涼快一點。

sentences.english: This is the coolest I’ve been all day.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是我今天待着的最涼快的地方了。

sentences.english: It's hot full to melt hell. I hope it be to be cooler soon.
sentences.chinese: 目前熱得足以把地獄熔化了，期望很快能夠涼快一點。

sentences.english: Soem one likes to head for the beach to cool off.
sentences.chinese: 一些人喜歡到海灘來涼快涼快。

definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
